title: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl
description: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl is an upcoming crossover fighting game developed by Ludosity and Fair Play Labs. It is the first console game in the long-running Nickelodeon Super Brawl series of browser games and mobile games. Featuring characters from various Nickelodeon shows, the game is scheduled to release on October 5, 2021 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and Microsoft Windows. It will be published by GameMill Entertainment in North America and Maximum Games in Europe.
